Managed XEN Linux and Windows VPS Hosting service by CtrlSwitches

We are here to provide you the best web hosting service, XEN Linux VPS hosting which enhances your digital presences. Your VPS is guaranteed with 99.99% uptime guarantee and don't worry about Managing Software, Hardware, Network, Security and Upgrades. Managed Windows VPS hosting services is provided on Xen-HVM platform, which is fully virtualized aka HVM (Hardware Virtual Machine) guests require CPU virtualization from the host CPU. So, you will have true power of the CPU, RAM and HDD`s.
